p: Data from the field survey were organized in an Excel sheet for quantitative analysis. The use reports (URs) were prepared following Tard√≠o and Pardo-de-Santayana [ 45] and further used to calculate quantitative ethnobotany indices: frequency of citation (FC), relative frequency of citation (RFC) and use value (UV). In the present study, quantitative analysis was used to assess the importance of the plants in the markets.
